text:

text: The demise of Jeff Adachi-- my update on what the @SFPD report does and doesn't show about the former @sfdefender's death from cocaine & alcohol overdose. LIVE at 5:50pm on @KCBSRadio

text: And now we wait. #MullerReport

text:

text: How much are you willing to pay to clean up #California' water? @GavinNewsom  considering charging state water customers up to $10/month to help clean up contaminated water in low-income and rural areas. Live with @BungerKCBSRadio us NOW on @KCBSRadio! https://player.radio.com/listen/station/kcbs-all-news-740-am-1069-fm …

text: As seen in #Oakland...Too bad they couldn’t fit his mini van into the design. #RaiderNation
author: philmatier

text: ICYMI: My take on why @SFGiants CEO Larry Baer is still in trouble despite DA's decision not to press charges in #domesticviolence incident. An update on the scandal and @dowhatsrightmlb public push to hold @MLB & Baer accountable on @KCBSRadio --
author: philmatier

text:
No charges yet but Larry Baer still has a giant problem. @BungerKCBSRadio and I talk Politics around @SFGiants embattled CEO at 7:50am on @KCBSRadio. Tune in! 
https://player.radio.com/listen/station/kcbs-all-news-740-am-1069-fm …
author: philmatier

text: I don’t see this ‘going away’ anytime soon.
author: philmatier

text:
A surcharge on @Uber & @Lyft in #SF could raise $30M/year for traffic-congestion relief. SF Transpo Authority estimated ride hails account for 1/2 of heavy downtown #traffic btw 2010 & 2016. But will voters pass the deal? 
@sfcta @sfchronicle @AaronPeskin
author: philmatier

text: Heads up #580 drivers in @AlamedaCounty- crash near #AltamontPass blocking several lanes.  #Traffic
author: philmatier

text: I don't want to speak for the authors, but it's my understanding that Mayor @LondonBreed & @dowhatsrightmlb are asking @MLB to hold Baer accountable to *its own* policy re players & domestic violence.
author: philmatier

text:
"In 2015, MLB became one of the first major professional sports leagues to adopt a policy on domestic violence... Behavior does not have to be criminal in order for it to be wrong and contrary to the standards set by #MLB."-@dowhatsrightmlb 
Full letter- https://www.dowhatsrightmlb.org
author: philmatier

text:
“If the wealthy want to grease the skids, they shouldn’t be able to do so at the expense of American taxpayers.” #Orgeon's @RonWyden says rich patents shouldn't get tax breaks for donations aimed at influencing college admissions. 
More w @stiles @latimes
author: philmatier

text: Check out the full letter here- https://www.dowhatsrightmlb.org
author: philmatier

text: "Pls don’t allow yourself to be distracted by the public claims of attorneys over the legality of the behavior we all saw on videotape. #Baseball is better than this. @SFGiants are better than this. And our community is better than this." said @dowhatsrightmlb
author: philmatier

text: As they say-- "let's go to the tape."
author: philmatier

text: Bay Area women's activists call on @MLB to suspend @SFGiants CEO after physical altercation w wife caught on tape. Major players bringing the heat include Mayor @LondonBreed, @LaCasaSF, @statusofwomensf, @debmesloh & BART's @lateefahsimon More @sfchronicle
author: philmatier

text:
Anti-domestic violence activists call for Larry Baer's suspension in wake of incident with wife caught on camera earlier this month. @BungerKCBSRadio and I will break down the the controversy on @KCBSRadio at 7:50am. Tune in this morning! #SF @SFGiants 
https://www.sfchronicle.com/giants/article/Video-shows-Giants-CEO-Larry-Baer-dragging-wife-13656221.php …
author: philmatier

author: philmatier

text: Vote went though! Looks like #RaiderNation will stay by the Bay for one more year. #Oakland fans-- are you happy with the deal? @Raiders #NFL
author: philmatier

text: Good question. The vote today included both members of #Oakland City Council & the County supes-- so you can bet its gonna happen. #RadierNation will be in Oakland for another year.
author: philmatier
